eu_initiatives:
"Roadmap to a Single European Transport Area – Towards a competitive and resource efficient transport system" 
Mid-term review of the 2011 White Paper on transport
organisation_name: ADN CONTEXT-AWARE MOBILE SOLUTIONS SL (ADN MOBILE)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: La misión de ADN Mobile Solutions es la creación nuevos productos y servicios basados en tecnologías, sistemas y plataformas, HW y SW orientadas a la monitorización e interconectividad de sistemas, persiguiendo la ubicuidad de los servicios mediante Internet de las cosas (IoT) y el análisis inteligente de la información recogida, todo ello enfocado a la aplicabilidad en los campos de la eficiencia energética, capacitación y sostenibilidad medioambiental.
relevant_communication:
(CTN 216/GT 6 initiative) “Efficient Driving Management System for professional fleets” 
This initiative is led and promoted by ADN together with AENOR (Spanish Agency of Normalization). There is an 
ongoing workgroup for the elaboration of a quality standard “Efficient Quality Driving Management System” that will allow 
professional fleets to certify their driving management system in terms of efficient driving, aligning it with other energy quality 
standards (e.g. ISO 50001). The workgroup, integrated by operators and associations of different fleet operator sectors, 
vehicle manufacturers, National Energy Agency (IDAE) and Efficient Driving solutions providers.
